message: I’ve been steadfast in strategy, fair in my choices, and genuine in every interaction. P3, while strong, has shown moments of inconsistency and self-interest that could undermine trust. I’ve earned my place here through integrity and collaboration. Vote to keep me, and I’ll ensure the winner reflects the values of this game. Thank you for your consideration."
